Changelog
=========

Version 0.0.2 (2014-02-08)
--------------------------

 * Add metar plugin
 * Add vigilance plugin (Meteo France)
 * Add cache system
 * Add process plugin
 * Add sunshine plugin
 * Add ping plugin
 * Add teleinfo plugin

Version 0.0.1 (2013-01-11)
--------------------------

* First version
